attributes.long-description:
Whether you like virtual farming, wheeling and dealing, or gem hunting, the Alawar Minis Bundle has something for you! Harvest a bumper crop of fun as you complete outrageously wacky levels in Farm Frenzy 3. Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank as you take economic revenge on a conniving ex-spouse. And Enchanted Cavern will challenge you to match gems on a breathtaking journey through a magical world. With three hit games for one low price, you'll enjoy untold hours of fun!



This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

© 2014 ALAWAR ENTERTAINMENT, INC.
attributes.name: Alawar Minis Bundle
